channel.title: Ipod Itunes on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Ipod Itunes on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Smart Playlists are my friend
item.description: So.. I was playign with itunes (wierd) and I discovered that the ipod generates smart playlists in real time. It RULES so much. I can have a history of songs played. I can have a list of all my highly rated songs. it is so incredibly cool!!!
